title: Community Mental Health: Issues and Practices
description: An overview of community mental health as envisioned via California's Mental Health Services Act. Examination of the opportunities and challenges in delivering effective mental health services in publicly-funded setting. Exploration of concepts and practices in contemporary public mental healthy, including innovative approaches. 4 seminars.
prerequisites: Admission to the MS Program in Psychology; PSY 456, PSY 555, PSY 556, and PSY 560
